answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Philip, 
I believe you may find the Green Infrastructure Investment Program from Alachua County, FL useful in reviewing potential land donations from groups and individuals. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2767/GreenInfrastructureInvestmentProgram
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Philip Freeman
text: Does your local government have a formal review process (with evaluative criteria) to determine whether to accept park land that a group or individual would like to donate?
title: Park Land Donation Review Process
